official-title.#text: To direct the Secretary of the Interior to study the suitability and feasibility of designating the Prison Ship Martyrs’ Monument in Fort Greene Park, in the New York City borough of Brooklyn, as a unit of the National Park System.

attestation-date.#text: Passed the House of Representatives April 28, 2014.

header.#text: Prison Ship Martyrs’ Monument study; report

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Prison Ship Martyrs’ Monument Preservation Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Prison Ship Martyrs’ Monument Preservation Act

text.#text: This section may be cited as the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: shall complete a study to determine the suitability and feasibility of designating the Prison Ship Martyrs’ Monument in Fort Greene Park, in the New York City borough of Brooklyn, as a unit of the

text.#text: The study required under this subsection shall be conducted in accordance with

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: section 8(c) of the National Park System General Authorities Act
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: National Park System General Authorities Act/s:8/ss:c

text.#text: an analysis of operational issues that should be considered if the Prison Ship Martyrs’ Monument were to be designated as a unit of the
an analysis of the feasibility of administering the Prison Ships Martyrs’ Monument, considering its size, configuration, and other factors, including an annual cost estimate;
an analysis of the economic, educational, and other impacts of the designation of the Prison Ship Martyrs’ Monument as a unit of the
an analysis of the effect of the designation of the Prison Ship Martyrs’ Monument as a unit of the
existing commercial and recreational activities, and on the authorization, construction, operation, maintenance, or improvement of energy production and transmission infrastructure; and
the authority of State and local governments to manage those activities; and

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: to influence or participate in local land use decisions (such as zoning) or place restrictions on non-Federal lands if the Prison Ship Martyrs’ Monument is designated as a unit of the

text.#text: an identification of any authorities, including condemnation, that will compel or permit the
Upon commencement of the study, owners of private property in or adjacent to the Prison Ship Martyrs’ Monument shall be notified of the study’s commencement and scope.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Committee on Natural Resources of the House of Representatives

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: a report containing the conclusions of the study required by
